text:
It's opening day for our new @ClarkCountyFD fire station (#61) on the east side Las #Vegas Valley at Nellis and Charleston. Opening events include a pop-up #COVID19 #Vaccine Clinic. Vaccinations are first-come, first-serve starting at 1:30pm.

Read more: https://t.co/xy5LhExgdq. https://t.co/Mo8az5Qnvm
